title.narrative: Integrated HIV/AIDS Project in Haut Katanga and Lualaba (IHAP-HK/L)

description.narrative: This activity will work with the Government of the DRC (GDRC) to strengthen the continuum of care1 for quality HIV/AIDS services in select health zones to achieve epidemic control. This will be one of the main implementing mechanisms for the Presidents Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR) in the DRC.
